plugins.name: telnyx-webrtc-client
plugins.description: Telnyx WebRTC client SDK skills — build VoIP calling apps on web, iOS, Android, Flutter, and React Native. Covers authentication, call controls, push notifications, call quality metrics, and AI Agent integration.

plugins.name: telnyx-twilio-migration
plugins.description: Migrate from Twilio to Telnyx — product mapping, voice (TwiML to TeXML with full verb reference), messaging, WebRTC, number porting via FastPort, and Verify. Includes migration scripts and compatibility validation.
